channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 07:26 Fragrant anxiety in Zaporozhye and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Community. Solve for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 07:26 Fragrant anxiety in Zaporozhye and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Community. Solve for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 07:26 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Axiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-miravskaya territorial community-Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 07:26 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Axiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-miravskaya territorial community-Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
